{{Wired embedded system |brand=Bullguard |model=Dojo (DL0007) |upc=812878019905 |asin=B0728BLX76 |manuf_country=Singapore |is_manuf=No |availability=discontinued |price=200 |est_release_date=05/2017 |type=network security platform |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.67 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63139 |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TC4G83CFR-PBA |ram1_num=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=Single-Chip Bluetooth Low Energy SOC w/Support for Wireless Charging;Broadcom;BCM20737;;2;,,, 16-Channel 12-bit PWM I2C-bus LED Controller;NXP;PCA9685;;1;,,, 30V 8.8A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS4435BZ;;1; |flags=Bluetooth LE |oui_eth=38:B8:EB }} {{TagLine|Intelligent IoT Vulnerability Scanner}}
Consists of a base station and a portable : battery operated Bluetooth extension (Pebble)
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: Broadcom BCM63139 Dual-Core MIPS @1.0GHz *Storage: Unknown (obscured by blob) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3L) DRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet Ports *Power: 12V/1.67A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Dojo by Bullguard Top.jpeg|Board top File:Dojo by Bullguard Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom File:Dojo Pebble Top.jpeg|Pebble board top File:Dojo Pebble Bottom.jpeg|Pebble board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
